Buttons

Buttons indicate the action that will occur when a user clicks or touches it.

Examples

${require('html-loader?interpolate!../../partials/toggles.html')}

Secondary Button

Tertiary Button

Toggle Button

Icon Button

Filter Buttons

Guidelines

Button Type Purpose
Primary Use to highlight the main action on a page. Use only one per page.
Secondary Use for secondary actions on the page.
Tertiary Use for actions on the page that are used less than Secondary actions, such as actions within dialog boxes, toolbars, or inline content. When used with Primary and Secondary buttons, ensure the text is center aligned with that of the other buttons.
Dropdown Use when you have multiple secondary or primary actions that are grouped together or when you have too many actions to display individual buttons for each one.
Disabled Use when the user cannot complete an action. For example, moving forward until an input is filled out.
Small Button For use in tables where space is restricted.
Set of Buttons When placing multiple buttons on a screen, pair the primary action button with one or more secondary action buttons with 10px of space in between. The primary action should always be placed on the right, leading the user on to the next step.

Documentation

Buttons Button Dropdowns

Modifiers

Class Description
.btn-sm add class to a .btn.btn-secondary element to change size
.btn-lg add class to a .btn.btn-secondary element to change size
.uxf-btn-toggle add class to a .btn element to apply single toggle button styles

Convert from UXFrame v1 to v2

  1. Remove surrounding div.dropdown-menu from the ul element
  2. Change button .call-to-action to button .btn-primary
  3. Change button .small to button .btn-sm
  4. Change button .large to button .btn-lg
  5. Change div .dropdown-container to div .btn-group
  6. Change button .dropdown to button .dropdown-toggle
  7. Change button .invis to button .btn-link
  8. Add .btn to all button elements
  9. Add .dropdown-menu to the ul dropdown list
  10. Add data-toggle="dropdown" type="button" aria-expanded="true" to button.dropdown-toggle
